snippet: President Obama’s victory gives him a second chance to deliver the renewal he still promises, but without a clear mandate, a healthy economy or willing Republican partners.
abstract: Presidential historians who have sat with Pres Obama sense his overarching concern with carving out a place in history; Obama's re-election gives him a second chance to deliver the renewal he has long promised, but he must do so without a clear mandate, a healthy economy or willing Republican partners.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s victory gives him a second chance to deliver the renewal he still promises, but without a clear mandate, a healthy economy or willing Republican partners.

headline.main: Now, a Chance to Catch Up to His Epochal Vision
headline.print_headline: Now, a Chance to Catch Up to His Epochal Vision
